title: 175: Sir Gawain and the Decent Film
dc:creator: A.J. Hanenburg
description: In this episode we talk about the differences in theme and construction between the recent (pretty solid) film about Sir Gawain and the Green Knight and the poem by the same name.
itunes:author: Three fellas all wearing a green sash
itunes:subtitle: You know, not too bad, not the best.
itunes:summary: In this episode we talk about the differences in theme and construction between the recent (pretty solid) film about Sir Gawain and the Green Knight and the poem by the same name.
